title: Week 9 preview & Lions reaction
itunes:title: Week 9 preview & Lions reaction
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler - welcome in NFL Media's Andrew Siciliano to discuss the Detroit Lions’ decision to fire their GM, Martin Mayhew, and president ,Tom Lewand. Then, the heroes break down each Week 9 matchup, and recap the Bengals hanging on to their undefeated record with a 31-10 victory over the Browns.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
